reviews.review_content:
Maddalena is a wonderful Italian teacher-- not to mention straight from Italy!  She is beyond bright and well-versed in many topics yet is very humble and laid back.  She makes class interesting and very fun to attend.  We learned a lot about Italian opera, art and culture while we were able to stay on task in terms of grammar.
She is a fair grader and is willing to meet with her students if they do not fully understand a topic.  
Definitely take her class if you can! 

Workload:
Fair. Ideally a few hours per week of study.  1 quiz per week, 4 compositions per semester, and 1 oral presentation.
